CustomField.description: Added for: MMS Manually Entered or Fed in: Fed Brief Description of what this will represent: MMS Enterprise client Change Request: Update the Account Field Label Enterprise Hub Client Indicator to Enterprise Client Indicator (remove Hub). The hub concept was removed several years ago and we are now servicing Flex Enterprise clients therefore this field label should be more reflective of the current service model Case#:15905735
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Denotes Enterprise client; based on product complexity and annual revenue > than $100K
CustomField.label: Enterprise Client Indicator
